article_title: Caterpillar Says 'More Likely Than Not' to Win Tax Case
article_text:
Caterpillar Inc. believes it is "more likely than not" to persuade U.S. tax authorities that it complied with tax rules in pursuing a strategy that shifts profits to a Swiss subsidiary, the company said in a securities filing Monday.

The filing was a response to queries from staff members at the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission. Caterpillar didn't provide an estimate of how much additional liability it might have if...
